The mixing treatment strongly affects competitive fitness W of λcI857 (χ 1 2 = 79.15, p<0.0001, Fig 5). In the
undisturbed environment λcI857 fitness decreases by ~100 fold after the first transfer day, in contrast in the
24h-wet environment λcI857 fitness increases by ~5 fold. As expected, intermediate spatial disturbance treatments (
30s and
24h ) yield intermediate levels of λcI857 fitness ( Fig 5). This demonstrates that erosion of the spatial structure increases the fitness of the virulent λcI857 by ~500 fold. Note that additional transfers did not affect this pattern except for the treatment 30s where λcI857 fitness increases with time ( t = 5.08, p<10–4).
